title: Premium at the as applicable for area covered under Regulation No
clause_text: Premium at the as applicable for area covered under Regulation No. 31(1) &31(3) beyond the existing FSI/BUA shall be paid.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order

source_pdf.text_snippet: Premium at the as applicable for area covered under Regulation No. 31(1) &31(3) beyond the existing FSI/BUA shall be paid.
